command_name.description: Return review of arguments and paramenters of command. Call arguments like {arg1} or {arg1, arg2}

methods.description: Write one or few methods: create, update, delete. Example, [method=create] or [method={create, update}]

paginate.description: Write integer number, elements on page

command_name_second.description: Return review of arguments and paramenters of command. Call arguments like {arg1} or {arg1, arg2}

methods.description: Write one or few methods: create, update, delete. Example, [method=create] or [method={create, update}]

paginate.description: Write integer number, elements on page
